passages.text:
You are currently in the atrium of the Cowboys Stadium, Congragulations! There are mutiple locations that you may go, take your pick!

[[Go to the concession stand->Concessions]]
[[Go to the bathroom->Bathroom]]
[[Go to the bar->Bar]]
[[Go to the elite suite->Elite Suite]]
[[Go to the apparel shop->Apparel Shop]]
[[Go to the hall of fame->Hall of Fame]]
[[Go to the trophy room->Trophy Room]]

links.name: Go to the hall of fame

passages.name: AT&T Stadium
